title: Explosive Emmerdale showdown for Cain and Nate as three characters fight for life
text:

Emmerdale has confirmed a deadly stunt that sees Cain Dingle's revenge on Nate Robinson explode - literally - with lives on the line.

Three characters - Cain, Nate and Moira - will be left fighting for their lives in dramatic scenes that air next week on the ITV soap.

Moira will find herself trapped, while Cain and Nate will be battling for survival as the boat they are on explodes - but who survives?

The action during the show's big October week begins as Cain's wife Moira's affair with farmhand Nate is finally exposed, while the truth about his identity is also set to be revealed.

(Image: ITV)

Cain initially believes Pete Barton is the mystery man when his mum Faith Dingle alerts him to Moira's secret fling.

But after attacking him, he soon learns it's Nate who has been sleeping with his wife behind his back and he wants revenge.

He sets out to make both of them pay, and it's not long before events escalate with terrifying results that no one could have predicted.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Cain heads to the hotel the pair are staying at leaving them panicked, before asking them to get in his car which they do.

He drives them to a lake and says they are going on a little fishing trip leaving them nervous about what is on the cards.

As they get on the boat Nate finally admits the affair and it's clear Cain has murder in mind as the two men begin brutally fighting it out. Pictures show Nate with a bloodied head as Cain wields a weapon.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Things get out of control and Cain prepares to kill Nate as he picks up a giant plank of wood, and what happens next remains to be seen.

Moira, meanwhile, is knocked overboard in the commotion and is trapped in weeds underwater - will Cain save her?

He might not be able to, as amid the fight with Nate the boat bursts into flames after a petrol cannister spills.

As a fire rips through the boat those on board are left fighting for their lives, with it not known who lives and who dies.

Emmerdale airs weeknights at 7pm on ITV, with an extra episode at 8pm on Thursdays.
description: Emmerdale's Cain Dingle and Nate Robinson are caught up in a fireball during their deadly showdown - but who dies?
